subject: Order #SSN4744
description_text:
Good morning, I received my order today but it's incomplete; the haptics are missing as I ordered, only the pedals... please resolve the problem

Enviado do meu iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Andr? Nunes,    Your package was shipped in two separate deliveries. The other shipment has been delayed due to unexpectedly high demand, resulting in a nearly two-week stock shortage for this item. We shipped it on the 14th and sincerely apologize for the delay. Below is your tracking link:   https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047221881242
